nodes.text: Vritol was a male Wookiee that lived during the Galactic Civil War. He was a creature trainer who lived along the Rryatt Trail.

Vritol appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
